title: Real Country
overview: Real Country is a country music showcase series featuring Shania Twain, Jake Owen and Travis Tritt.In each episode, Twain, Owen and Tritt hand-select emerging solo artists, duos and groups to perform in showcases that spotlight the rich traditions, songs and themes of specific country genres. The best artists from each showcase will perform in a grand finale, for the chance to be named one of country music's next breakout acts.
